# next-pwa minimal example

[TOC]

## Usage

[![gitpod](https://img.shields.io/static/v1.svg?label=TRY%20IT%20ON&message=GitPod.io&color=blue&style=for-the-badge&logoWidth=24&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://gitpod.io/#https://github.com/shadowwalker/next-pwa/)

``` bash
cd examples/minimal
yarn install
yarn build
yarn start
```
